mdRecord.dcterms:description: Praise for the physical attributes of this specific carrel. Lament about love life. 2 time, date, and temperature entries. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
Yo let's hear it for the lil window on the left. It makes this cubicle so much less depressing :) | girls suck :(
